Query.Sql: with BR as ( select Record ->> '$.LinkagePatientId.NhsNumber.@extension' as NhsNumber, coalesce( Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.StageDateIntegratedStage', Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.LinkageDiagnosticDetails.DateOfPrimaryDiagnosisClinicallyAgreed' ) as MeasurementDate, Record ->> '$.PrimaryPathway.Staging.TnmStageGroupingIntegrated' as TnmStageGroupingIntegrated from omop_staging.cosd_staging_901 where type = 'BR' ) select distinct NhsNumber, MeasurementDate, TnmStageGroupingIntegrated from BR where TnmStageGroupingIntegrated is not null;

Explanation.Description: The date of the staging measurement, either the integrated stage date or diagnosis date as fallback.
Explanation.Origin: STAGE DATE INTEGRATED STAGE / DATE OF PRIMARY CANCER DIAGNOSIS (CLINICALLY AGREED)

Explanation.Description: The TNM stage grouping (combined T, N, M categories) of the integrated stage.
